パッケージ org.apache.storm.testing

  • インタフェースのサマリー 
    インタフェース 説明
    AckFailDelegate  
    IntegrationTest
    Marker interface used to mark integration tests.
    TestJob
    This is the core interface for the storm java testing, usually we put our java unit testing logic in the run method.
  • クラスのサマリー 
    クラス 説明
    AckFailMapTracker  
    AckTracker  
    AlternateRackDNSToSwitchMapping
    This class implements the DNSToSwitchMapping interface It alternates bewteen RACK1 and RACK2 for the hosts.
    BatchNumberList  
    BatchProcessWord  
    BatchRepeatA  
    BoltTracker  
    CompleteTopologyParam
    The param class for the Testing.completeTopology.
    CountingBatchBolt  
    CountingCommitBolt  
    FeederSpout  
    FixedTuple  
    FixedTupleSpout  
    ForwardingMetricsConsumer  
    IdentityBolt  
    KeyedCountingBatchBolt  
    KeyedCountingCommitterBolt  
    KeyedSummingBatchBolt  
    MemoryTransactionalSpout  
    MemoryTransactionalSpoutMeta  
    MkClusterParam
    The param arg for Testing.withSimulatedTimeCluster and Testing.withTrackedCluster
    MkTupleParam  
    MockedSources  
    NGrouping  
    NonRichBoltTracker  
    OpaqueMemoryTransactionalSpout
    This spout only works in local mode.
    PrepareBatchBolt  
    PythonShellMetricsBolt  
    PythonShellMetricsSpout  
    SingleUserSimpleTransport 非推奨
    This is no longer available for testing purpose.
    SpoutTracker  
    TestAggregatesCounter  
    TestConfBolt  
    TestEventLogSpout  
    TestEventOrderCheckBolt  
    TestGlobalCount  
    TestKryoDecorator  
    TestPlannerBolt

    TestWordCounter  
    TestWordSpout  
    TrackedTopology  
    TupleCaptureBolt
